summary: The queen of mythical Sylvania marries a courtier, who finds his new life unsatisfying.
cast: Maurice Chevalier|Jeanette MacDonald|Lupino Lane|Lillian Roth|Eugene Pallette|E.H. Calvert|Edgar Norton|Lionel Belmore|Russ Powell|Carl Stockdale|Albert Roccardi|Anton Vaverka|Albert De Winton|William von Hardenburg|Margaret Fealy|Virginia Bruce|Josephine Hall|Rosalind Charles|Helene Friend|June Bupp|André Cheron|Yola d'Avril|Adolph Faylauer|Edward Gazelle|Winter Hall|Jean Harlow|Perry Ivins|Murdock MacQuarrie|Manuel París|Ben Turpin
title: El desfile del amor
